=== Debugging controls ===
{{info needed section|Did these exist in the code for a specific version range and were only enabled in the three mentioned versions? If so, what was the first version they existed in, and when were they removed from the code, if at all?}}
These controls are used for debugging and were unintentionally left in-game in the following versions: [[Beta 1.8 Pre-release]] (pre-reupload only), [[Beta 1.9 Prerelease 5]] and snapshot [[12w08a]].<ref name="Pre5Unintended">{{Tweet|jeb|129585294214299648|As you know I always forget at least one thing when upload a release... The "camera controls" (F6 etc) are not supposed to be there {{=}}/|October 27, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{Tweet|jeb|172982497104240640|I forgot to disable them in the snapshot|February 24, 2012}}</ref> The controls are called the [[Third person view|"deadmau5 camera"]].<ref name="deadmau5camera">{{Tweet|jeb|172983022038163456|They don't really.. They are called "deadmau5 camera" in the code and was only added for him. They were accidentally enabled|February 24, 2012}}</ref>
{| class="wikitable" width="100%" data-description="PC debug screen keys"
|-
! width="100" |Key
!Function
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|Y}}
| Zooms in camera.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" /> This and the controls below are the [[Third-person view|deadmau5 camera]].<ref name="deadmau5camera" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|H}}
| Zooms out camera.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|Y}} + {{key|H}}
|Resets the camera's zoom.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|N}}
|Rotates camera Counter-Clockwise.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|M}}
|Rotates camera Clockwise.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|N}} + {{key|M}}
|Resets the camera's rotation.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|U}}
|Pans camera forward.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|O}}
|Pans camera backward.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|I}}
|Slowly pans the camera up.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|K}}
|Slowly pans the camera down.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|J}}
|Slowly pans the camera left.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|L}}
|Slowly pans the camera right.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|F6}}
|Freezes the player's y-axis position if pressed once, and pressing it again unfreezes their y-axis position.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|-
| style="font-size: medium; text-align: center" |{{key|F9}}
| Freezes the player's camera in place.<ref name="Pre5Unintended" />
|}
